author: ituckey
title: Daniel Sturridge injured again as hip woe rules Liverpool striker out of Arsenal clash… after he resumed training following a virus
text:
EFL STURR STRUCK AGAIN Daniel Sturridge injured again as hip woe rules Liverpool striker out of Arsenal clash… after he resumed training following a virus 
Liverpool's England striker is still fit enough to train but not with the team, says frustrated Anfield boss Jurgen Klopp By David Facey 3rd March 2017, 8:16 pm Updated: 3rd March 2017, 8:44 pm
